name: Project_3_Picas Painting
description:
Use basic cubes to paint anything you want. 

The idea is to make cubism art!

You can adjust the rotation and scale of the cubes you paint. You can also adjust the color of your brush with the RGB slider or change the brush shape from the drop down.

New Features Added:

Hide the UI panel to view the canvas space

New Brush shapes

There is a Color Randomize button and an animate scale size button. You use both buttons to change the look of your painting. Experiment in many ways!
